summary: I retextured a couple of armor pieces and put them together in a standalone armor set I believe looks like a scouts attire.
descriptionHtml:
I retextured these armor pieces and put them together in a standalone set
I thought they looked like the attire a scout would wear (more so than the imperial stuff) so that\'s what I made them
all the screenshots do is showcase the fact that it works for both normal and beast races.

You can craft it at any forge under the leather heading.

Please feel free to alter this mod as long as my name (zacsayer/Fury945) ends up in you readme with a description of what I contributed

thanks to Bethesda for skyrim and its meshes.

due to the comments thread being unable to be started I suggest you PM me with any questions.
author: Fury945
